data.title: Paneer Housefull Wrap
data.description: Loads of grilled paneer & a mix of exotic veggies dripping in a spicy Desi sauce & Green chutney. Paneer wrap truly done better!

data.title: Chicken Bhuna Wrap
data.description: The ultimate Desi Wrap with Chicken Kebab, special spicy sauce, Green chutney rolled with Onions in a whole wheat paratha!

data.title: Chicken Mayo Wrap
data.description: Loaded with Fire Grilled Chicken topped with a generous portion of Mayo & the perfect amount of crunchy veggies

data.title: Chicken Tikka Wrap
data.description: Classic chicken tikka roll in a whole wheat paratha & tikka sauce. A BOX8 Special!

data.title: Veggie Patty Wrap
data.description: Oven Grilled all-veg patty with a flavourful tikka sauce wrapped with fresh veggies! Tantalize your Desi taste-buds!
